about_the_game:
The Necromancer will bring the dead to life. The 'Resurrect' ability, although not a unique ability, can be helpful to players who do not have a cleric in their party. As the name suggests, 'Resurrect' will restore health to a fallen mercenary. The Necromance has a second ability, 'Undead Hand,' which spawns a tainted glove that will gather merit and attack enemies. When the Necromancer is prestiged, every token collected has a chance to be duplicated.

Base Stats
  • Health: 10
  • Energy: 14
  • Attack: 2
  • Gather Amount: 24
  • Convert Amount: 280
Prestige Party Buff
  • + 1% Token duplication chance
Resurrect
  • Revives a fallen mercenary with half health. Additional health is granted dependent on mercenary level.
Undead Hand
  • Spawns a tainted glove that will help gather merit and fight enemies.
